query.placeholder:
Enter your SQL query here...
Tip: clicking the task number again pre-fills a query with the expected column names.
query.alreadyValidatedTaskError: This task has already been validated.
query.unparsableUserQueryError: Your SQL query contains syntax errors and cannot be parsed.
query.missingFormulaError: This task is missing its token formula.
query.missingColumnsError: Your query is missing required columns: {columns}.
query.tooFewTablesError: Your query references too few tables - {count} more table(s) required.
query.noTokenError: No token found in query results.
query.emptyFeedbackError: No feedback message available for this task.
query.genericError: An unexpected error occurred while checking your query.

notes.placeholder: What you write here is saved locally and will persist across sessions.

schema-tab.notAvailable: Schema is not available for this database.

execution-tab.title: Run
execution-tab.runPrompt: Run a query to see the results

error.wrongColumnsError: The column names in your query do not match the expected columns.
